label: slaveReplicas
description: the num of postgres database slave pod replicas and default is 1

label: postgresqlUsername
description: postgres admin user name and default is postgres

label: postgresqlPassword
description: postgres admin user password and default is zcloud

label: postgresqlDatabase
description: postgres database name and default is zdns

label: storageClass
description: postgres data persistent volume storageclass name

label: persistentVolumeSize
description: postgres data persistent volume size and default is 8(Gi)
